channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 07:51 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh in the direction
item.description: 游 07:51 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh in the direction This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
